article_title: REITs That Help You Sleep Well At Night

article_metadata.description: It takes a real superstar to be included in the SWAN club, and to even qualify for my prestigious ranking system a REIT must have demonstrated a long-term track record for paying and increasing dividends.
article_metadata.author: Brad Thomas
